channel.title: NPR Topics: Culture
channel.description: Art and entertainment commentary plus interviews, book reviews, movie reviews, music reviews, comedy, and visual art. Subscribe to podcasts and follow trends in music, painting, art, architecture, photography, and design.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Curling builds community in rural Massachusetts
item.description: In tiny Petersham, Mass., a volunteer-run curling club is a gathering place for people of all ages who love to curl and hang out.
item.content:encoded: In tiny Petersham, Mass., a volunteer-run curling club is a gathering place for people of all ages who love to curl and hang out.
item.dc:creator: Jill Kaufman

item.title: Gothic romance reaches new 'Heights' as fan communities collide
item.description: Of course now was the moment for a Charli xcx-assisted Wuthering Heights: Pop fandoms and literary ones have rarely had more in common, especially when it comes to epic romance.
item.content:encoded:
Wuthering Heights. The film arrives in a landscape where the fan cultures of pop music and romance literature have already been intertwining in striking ways.'/>

Of course now was the moment for a Charli xcx-assisted Wuthering Heights: Pop fandoms and literary ones have rarely had more in common, especially when it comes to epic romance.

(Image credit: Paul Kooiker)
item.dc:creator: Ann Powers

item.title: Where the word 'Olympics' comes from and what it means to someone who competed there
item.description: It's a word that evokes national pride and rare talent, and one that has been around for thousands of years.
item.content:encoded:
It's a word that evokes national pride and rare talent, and one that has been around for thousands of years.

(Image credit: Ashley Landis)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: 8 creative ways to build your village, according to our listeners
item.description: NPR listeners share how they've made relationships with their neighbors and community. Many of them, through parties, potlucks and coffees, say they've made the first move.
item.content:encoded: NPR listeners share how they've made relationships with their neighbors and community. Many of them, through parties, potlucks and coffees, say they've made the first move.
item.dc:creator: Mika Ellison

item.title: A lonely day leads to a college poetry prize
item.description: The Academy of American Poets gives prizes to university and college students. One of them is Lauren Chumbley.
item.content:encoded: The Academy of American Poets gives prizes to university and college students. One of them is Lauren Chumbley.
item.dc:creator: Neda Ulaby

item.title: Hollywood's on a roll. Here are 7 movies we're looking forward to this spring
item.description: Baby Yoda's big-screen debut, Ryan Gosling in space, The Devil Wears Prada 2, and a Peaky Blinders movie are all coming out before Memorial Day.
item.content:encoded:
Baby Yoda's big-screen debut, Ryan Gosling in space, The Devil Wears Prada 2, and a Peaky Blinders movie are all coming out before Memorial Day.

(Image credit: Jonathan Olley)
item.dc:creator: Bob Mondello

item.title: Remembering the night Jesse Jackson read 'Green Eggs and Ham' on 'Saturday Night Live'
item.description: We look back on Jesse Jackson's 1991 Saturday Night Live appearance reading Green Eggs and Ham in honor of Dr. Seuss. Jackson died on Tuesday at age 84.
item.content:encoded: We look back on Jesse Jackson's 1991 Saturday Night Live appearance reading Green Eggs and Ham in honor of Dr. Seuss. Jackson died on Tuesday at age 84.
item.dc:creator: Elizabeth Blair

item.title: 'Crime 101' is an old-fashioned heist film that pays off
item.description: Chris Hemsworth stars as a virtuoso jewel thief, and Mark Ruffalo plays the detective tracking him down in Crime 101. This thriller is a deliberate throwback — and also a lot of fun.
item.content:encoded:
Chris Hemsworth stars as a virtuoso jewel thief, and Mark Ruffalo plays the detective tracking him down in Crime 101. This thriller is a deliberate throwback — and also a lot of fun.

(Image credit: Merrick Morton)
item.dc:creator: John Powers

item.title: A photojournalist details her rebellion against the Syrian regime -- and her father
item.description: Loubna Mrie grew up in Syria, where her father was allegedly an assassin for the regime. She joined the Syrian revolution first as a protester and then as a photojournalist. Her memoir is Defiance.
item.content:encoded: Loubna Mrie grew up in Syria, where her father was allegedly an assassin for the regime. She joined the Syrian revolution first as a protester and then as a photojournalist. Her memoir is Defiance.
item.dc:creator: Aarti Shahani

item.title: U.S. women's figure skaters could've been rivals. Instead, they're the 'Blade Angels'
item.description: Amber Glenn, Alysa Liu and Isabeau Levito are the U.S.' best shot at winning women's figure skating gold since 2002 — and of closing out these Games on a high note.
item.content:encoded:
Amber Glenn, Alysa Liu and Isabeau Levito are the U.S.' best shot at winning women's figure skating gold since 2002 — and of closing out these Games on a high note.

(Image credit: Jamie Squire)
item.dc:creator: Rachel Treisman
